name: Tshirt
description: Show off your style with our classic T-shirt, made from soft, breathable cotton for all-day comfort, featuring a timeless fit and a range of vibrant colors to suit any occasion.

name: Smartphone
description: Stay connected in style with our latest smartphone, featuring a stunning high-resolution display, advanced camera capabilities, and a sleek design that fits comfortably in your hand.

name: Microwave
description: Simplify your cooking with our versatile microwave, designed with multiple cooking presets and a sleek stainless steel finish, making meal preparation quick and convenient for any kitchen.

name: Lipstik
description: Add a pop of color to your look with our luxurious lipstick, enriched with nourishing ingredients for a smooth application and long-lasting wear, available in a variety of stunning shades to match any occasion.

name: Puzzle
description: Challenge your mind and have fun with our engaging toy puzzle, designed with colorful pieces that promote problem-solving skills and creativity, perfect for kids and adults alike!

name: Blender
description: Elevate your culinary experience with our powerful blender, designed with a sleek, ergonomic shape and multiple speed settings to effortlessly blend, mix, and puree your favorite ingredients.

name: Dog Leash
description: Keep your furry friend safe and stylish with our durable dog leash, crafted from high-quality, lightweight materials and featuring a comfortable grip for long walks.

name: Neclace
description: Adorn yourself with elegance with this delicate necklace, featuring a refined chain and a shimmering pendant that adds a touch of sophistication to any outfit.

name: Sofa
description: Experience ultimate comfort and style with our modern, plush sofa, featuring a sleek design and premium fabric that complements any living space.
